articles.title: Five soldiers shot and wounded by Army sergeant at Fort Stewart, officials say
articles.description: An Army sergeant opened fire at Fort Stewart in Georgia, shooting five soldiers and prompting a brief lockdown at one of the country's largest Army bases, officials said. The alleged shooter is in custody.

articles.title: Trump plans to meet Putin, Zelenskyy as soon as next week, NYT reports
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump plans to meet in person with Russian President Vladimir Putin as early as next week, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing two people familiar with the plan. Mr. Trump then plans to meet with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

articles.title: Top 4 news stories you need to know: August 6, 2025
articles.description: FOX 35's John Brown and Garrett Wymer break down the top news stories of the day, from the shooting of five US Army soldiers at Fort Stewart in Georgia to a tandem bike rollercoaster making its first-ever US stop in Central Florida.
